body.name: Nature's Bounty Vitamin C + Rose Hips, Immune Support, 1000mg, Coated Caplets, 100 Ct
features: A LEADING VITAMIN FOR IMMUNE SUPPORT (1): Vitamin C is one of the leading nutritional vitamins for immune support; (1) People reach for Vitamin C plus Rose Hips by Nature’s Bounty to help them maintain a healthy immune system all year long (1)

WHITE BLOOD CELL SUPPORT (1): Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Plus Rose Hips Caplets contain 1000 mg of Vitamin C which is a nutrient that plays an important role in the functioning of white blood cells which are vital components of the immune system (1)
ANTIOXIDANT SUPPLEMENT: Vitamin C is one of the best antioxidants for fighting free radicals; (1) Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells

QUALITY IS OUR PRIORITY: Nature’s Bounty is committed to the safety of all of our supplements; Our Vitamin C Plus Rose Hips Caplets are non-GMO gluten- and sugar-free and contain no artificial colors or sweeteners.

FROM THE TRUSTED WELLNESS EXPERTS: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C supplements are a product of 50 years of dedication to quality consistency and scientific research to make vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence
body.description: Support a healthy immune system with Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Plus Rose Hips coated caplets. (1) As a leading vitamin for immune support, Vitamin C is an important nutrient for the functioning of white blood cells, which are vital components of the immune system. (1) It is also one of the best antioxidants for fighting free radicals. (1) Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells. (1) This immune supporting supplement also provides 20 mg of Rose Hips. (1) Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C plus Rose Hips caplets combine science, nature and 50 years of expertise to provide the easiest way to increase your daily intake of this important vitamin. For added wellness support, Vitamin C Plus Rose Hips Caplets are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Immune Support You Can Trust (1) For 50 years, Nature’s Bounty has blended the best of nature with the latest in science and nutritional innovation. Give your body the immune support it needs to help maintain overall health year round. (1) From essential vitamins like Vitamin C and zinc to herbal health formulas like elderberry gummies, our range of Immune Health products offer you only the purest, most trusted ingredients to help you maintain a healthy immune system. (1) From the #1 Brand for Zinc (3) comes Nature’s Bounty Zinc Caplets and Zinc Gummies. Zinc is a trace element that plays a vital role in immune support while also supporting antioxidant health. (1) Nature’s Bounty also offers an array of Vitamin C products, including Nature’s Bounty Immune 24 + with 1,000 mg of Ester-C, the only clinically studied Vitamin C that stays in your white blood cells up to 24 hours, for round the clock immune support. (1)

Driving Innovation Through Scientific Expertise Our Scientific Advisory Council is made up of some of the most respected scientists and researchers in the field who play a key role in the Company’s product innovation and scientific advancement. Quality You Can Count On At Nature's Bounty, we prioritize a high standard of quality control to deliver the great supplements available. Our rigorous process ensures that every product meets our criteria for excellence. We are committed to providing you with the best possible experience and results for your health and wellness. Don’t Just Take Our Word for It We’re proud that our products are manufactured in state-of-the-art facilities that meet FDA’s regulations. We pride ourselves on using high quality ingredients, leaving no room for compromise. Trust that when you choose our products, you are choosing safety and efficacy above all else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The price is right! The product is great! I trust this supplement brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fantastic supplement that has helped me maintain a healthy immune system.
reviews.reviewText: Nature's Bounty Vitamin C + Rose Hips is a fantastic supplement that has helped me maintain a healthy immune system. As someone who is always on the go, I need a supplement to keep up with my active lifestyle. This product has been a lifesaver in that regard.One of the things I love about this supplement is that it contains 1000mg of Vitamin C per caplet, which is more than enough to meet my daily recommended intake. Vitamin C is a crucial nutrient that helps support immune health, and it also has antioxidant properties that can help protect against cellular damage caused by free radicals.The addition of rose hips in this supplement is also a significant plus. Rose hips are the fruit of the rose plant and are a rich source of Vitamin C and other beneficial nutrients like flavonoids and carotenoids. Rose hips have been used for centuries in traditional medicine to help support immune health, and they are a great addition to this supplement.Another thing I appreciate about Nature's Bounty Vitamin C + Rose Hips is that the caplets are coated, making them easy to swallow. I've had trouble with other Vitamin C supplements that were difficult to eat, so this is a significant plus in my book.I also love that this supplement is free of artificial colors, flavors, and sweeteners. I'm always trying to make healthier choices regarding what I put into my body, and this supplement fits the bill perfectly.I've been delighted with Nature's Bounty Vitamin C + Rose Hips. It has helped me maintain a healthy immune system and feel my best, even during the cold and flu seasons. I recommend this supplement to anyone seeking a high-quality Vitamin C supplement to support their immune health.
